paper.title: Research on the Effects of Equity Incentive on Performance for American Listed Shipping Companies
paper.abstract: Based on American shipping data of listed companies, the article makes positive research on effect degrees by equity incentive to financial performance. It establishes regression model and makes analysis of mixed section, reveals that equity incentive has continuous, stable and positive effect on business performance and shows distinct influence in the perspective of horizontal and vertical ways. Listed shipping companies with good performance trend to utilize equity incentive system to decrease business risk and promote profit level as well.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究股权激励对美国上市航运公司财务绩效的影响，虽然提到了降低业务风险，但其核心研究并不涉及衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理。
